description: This file is the main entry point for a Vue.js frontend application using Vite, initializing the app with Pinia for state management and Vue Router for routing.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Creates a new Vue application instance for the main App component.

methods.name: createPinia
methods.description: Creates a new Pinia store instance for state management.

methods.name: app.use
methods.description: Registers plugins like Pinia and Router into the Vue application.

methods.name: app.mount
methods.description: Mounts the Vue application to the DOM element with id 'app'.
